definition.name: Submodule Sync
definition.description: Automatically update a submodule to the latest commit

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: The GitHub API token to use

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: The path in the repo to update

inputs.name: ref
inputs.description: The branch name to check for updates in the remote repo

inputs.name: pr_branch
inputs.description: The name of the branch to use when creating a pull request

inputs.name: target_branch
inputs.description: The name of the branch that the PR should be raised against

inputs.name: base_branch
inputs.description: The name of the branch that the PR should be based on

inputs.name: pr_body
inputs.description: Text to include in the generated PR's description

inputs.name: pr_labels
inputs.description: The labels that the PR will have, newline-seperated

evidence.reasoning: This action is designed to automatically update a submodule to the latest commit, which directly relates to managing dependencies within a repository.
